channel.title: 6.2 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds
channel.description: Recent content in 6.2 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds

item.title: 6.2.4 for Windows
item.description: Note ODBC and SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage. All Dynamic builds have -DFEATURE_sql_xxx=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. Note Since Qt 6.2 Qt made SSL backends as plugin. We build SChannel and OpenSSL backend plugin, with OpenSSL backend built with OpenSSL 3 series. Additionally, Visual Studio versions of Qt builds supports TLS 1.3 using SecureTransport. Note All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.

item.title: 6.2.4 for macOS
item.description: Note SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -DFEATURE_sql_sqlite=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. Note Since Qt 6.2 Qt made SSL backends as plugin. We build SecureTransport and OpenSSL backend plugin, with OpenSSL backend built with OpenSSL 3 series. Note All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. Note No QtWebEngine in this version. CVE issue patched All builds of Qt 6.

item.title: 6.2.4 for Android
item.description: Note SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -DFEATURE_sql_sqlite=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. Note Since Qt 6.2 Qt made SSL backends as plugin. We build OpenSSL backend plugin with OpenSSL 3 series. Note All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. Note All builds are using NDK r23c with -DANDROID_NATIVE_API_LEVEL=24, it means the APK built using these packages may be not able to run on Android 7.

item.title: 6.2.4 for WebAssembly
item.description: Note SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -DFEATURE_sql_sqlite=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. Note All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. Note All builds are using emscripten SDK 2.0.14 as recommended in Qt Wiki. All builds are with -DFEATURE_thread=ON. Note Qt for WebAssembly can’t be built to shared libs. CVE issue patched All builds have following CVEs fixed:
